name: Laser Puzzle in VR
detailed_description:
Mod and laconic interior of a space base, relaxing soundtrack and nice brainteaser.

You should solve it to enjoy shining figure and to get the reward – next brain-twister. Behind the apparently simplistic gameplay (you need to place the limited number of the elements properly on a field or several fields only) there are complicated and creative decisions.


Challenge your brain starting from compact puzzle to gigantic brainstorm on 2 walls.
XX diversified levels of different complexity and with various approaches to solve them.
about_the_game:
Mod and laconic interior of a space base, relaxing soundtrack and nice brainteaser.

You should solve it to enjoy shining figure and to get the reward – next brain-twister. Behind the apparently simplistic gameplay (you need to place the limited number of the elements properly on a field or several fields only) there are complicated and creative decisions.


Challenge your brain starting from compact puzzle to gigantic brainstorm on 2 walls.
XX diversified levels of different complexity and with various approaches to solve them.
short_description:
Are you looking for dynamics and action, shooting and crashing? – sorry, this game is not for you.
Wanna challenge your brain by tricky puzzles? - Don't pass by!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56 or better
